text: Igor Saveljić (born 17 August 1995) is a Montenegrin tennis player. Saveljić has a career high ATP singles ranking of 1340 achieved on 13 July 2015. He also has a career high ATP doubles ranking of 1183 achieved on 16 March 2020.
